definition: variant of 周濟|周济[zhou1 ji4]
to give to the needy/to bestow alms/charity
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji

sentences.english: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms.
sentences.chinese: 他看見彼得約翰將要進殿，就求他們賙濟。

sentences.english: She extends a helping hand to the poor and opens her arms to the needy.
sentences.chinese: 她張手賙濟困苦人，伸手幫助窮乏人。

sentences.english: James lived on without begging alms from others.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯沒有向別人乞求賙濟照樣過活。

sentences.english: My mother often gives alms to the poor.
She opens her arms to the poor and extends her hands to the needy.
sentences.chinese: 她張手賙濟困苦人，伸手幫補窮乏人。

sentences.english: We handed out gifts of food and clothing to the survivors of the flood.
sentences.chinese: 我們向水災中的倖存者賙濟了食品和衣物。

sentences.english: Fan Zhongyan donated money to bulit schools and to help poors in his hometown.
sentences.chinese: 范仲淹在家鄉捐錢辦學，賙濟窮人。

sentences.english: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence, and given to the poor?
sentences.chinese: 說，這香膏爲什麼不賣三十兩銀子賙濟窮人呢。

sentences.english: This perfume could have been sold at a high price and the money given to the poor.
sentences.chinese: 這香膏可以賣許多錢，賙濟窮人。
